name: Whole World
lyrics:
作词 : Peineng Dai/Hoi Wai Raphael Lam/Tong Ling Shan Gareth
作曲 : Peineng Dai/Hoi Wai Raphael Lam/Tong Ling Shan Gareth
I’ll buy Louis-V bags, a couple Gucci belts, just to show you
我要买LV的包和古驰的皮带，就是告诉你
That I’m alright, that these Os, in my bank,
我很好，我银行里有很多“你怎么这么有钱！”
Could stop me thinkin ‘bout you
但都无法让我停止想你
With someone new, with someone who,
不管和哪个新人一起，和谁一起
Who has more time on their hands than I do
和比我更有时间的人一起
What could I do, at 22, you made me choose,
我22，我能做的，请你选择
Now all these tunes are ‘bout you
如今所有旋律都有关于你


So what I’m ‘bout to say seems overdue,
我要说的似乎早该说
I wish I’d turn back time and click undo,
我好想时光倒流，按下撤销键
You gave me time, missed all your signs,
你给过我机会，我却错过你所有的暗示
But I had put you back in line
但我让你重回正轨


Now I got the whole,
我现在拥有一切
Whole world in my hands
全世界在我手中
But it doesn't even matter
但这一点不重要


With the whole,
就算拥有一切
Whole world in my hands
拥有全世界在我手中
But it feels a little different
这感觉和想象有些不同


With the whole,
就算拥有全世界
Whole world in my hands
就算全世界在我手中
It still feels a little empty
我还是觉得有点空


When my whole,
只有当我的一切
Whole world is you
当我的全世界是你时
Is you
是你


A new city every night, spent a lot time on flights,
每晚飞去一个新的城市，在飞机上花很多时间
Guess it's okay
我猜那还不错
Cause it feels like I am, going according to plan,
因为感觉好像我，在按计划进行
But it's not what I had in my head
但我并不是真这么想
I’m in the clouds, in front of crowds,
我在云端，在人群前
But they’re just faces I don’t know,
但他们不过是我不认识的面孔
That I don’t wanna know about
不过是我不想关心的人
Cause your smile’s still in my brain,
因为你的笑容仍在我脑海中
Tokyo, Paris and LA,
东京，巴黎和洛杉矶
New people every night,
每晚和一个新的人度过
So I could numb away the pain
这样我就能麻痹痛苦


So what I’m ‘bout to say seems overdue,
所以我要说的似乎早该说
I wish I’d turn back time and click undo,
我多希望时光倒流，按下撤销键
You gave me time, missed all your signs,
你给我一段时光，而我却错过你所有的暗示
But I had put you back in line
但至少我让你重回正轨


Now I got the whole,
现在我拥有一切
Whole world in my hands
全世界在我手中
But it doesn't even matter
但这根本不重要


With the whole,
就算拥有一切
Whole world in my hands
就算全世界在我手中
But it feels a little different
这感觉和想象有些不同


With the whole,
就算拥有一切
Whole world in my hands
就算全世界在我手中
It still feels a little empty
我仍感觉内心空荡


When my whole,
只有当我的一切
Whole world is you
我的全世界是你时
Is you
是你


All these cities and these lights,
这些城市和灯光
These 7 hour flights
这7小时的航程
These tears that I hold in,
这些我忍住的眼泪
Cause I promised that I won't cry
只因为我承诺我不会哭
Hold my pillows deep at night,
夜晚紧抱我的枕头
To feel like someone’s by my side,
为了感受有人在我身边
Cause you’re not
只因为你不再
It took me way too long to realize that,
我耗费太久才意识到
It’s you
只是因为你


Now even I got the whole,
现在我拥有了一切
Whole world in my hands
全世界在我手中
But it doesn't even matter
但这根本不重要


With the whole,
就算我拥有一切
Whole world in my hands
就算全世界攥在我手中
But it feels a little different
这感觉还是有点不同


With the whole,
就算我拥有一切
Whole world in my hands
就算我拥有全世界
It still feels a little empty
我仍然感到有些空虚


When my whole,
只有当我的全部
Whole world is you
只有当我的世界是你时
Is you
我爱你才有意义
收起
